page.title: 092258 RAVENSNEUK FARM
page.content: 2258 RAVENSNEUK FARM The farm is situated 2 miles south of Penicuik beside the A701 and A766. Buildings include farm house with barn, two semi detached houses, south lodge cottage housing six people. The tenant farmer at Ravensneuk Farm farms 523 acres of land divided into 200 acres of moorland 200 of ploughable land and 123 acres of woodland and other.The farmer cultivates 75 acres of grassland, hay and silage, 50 acres barley, 14 acres turnips for winter feeding.The remaining acres are woodland and other use.The farm breeds grey and black faced sheep.300 breeding ewes,80 yearling hoggs and lambs.The sheep lamb between March and April.1985 has been a moderate lambing.200 deep litter chickens are kept.
